revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Firefly |model=ROC-RK3399 |revision=-PC (V1.1A) |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=T-Chip |price=100 |est_release_date=09/25/2018 |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=15 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=USB Female Type-C |cpu1_brand=Rockchip |cpu1_model=RK3399 |cpu1_cspeed=1.8 GHz |cpu1_cores=6 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q128JVSQ |ram1=4 GiB |ram1_brand=SK Hynix |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe (NGFF), USB 3.0 (Type C), USB 2.0 |expansion_minipcie_num=2 |expansion_usb_num=5 |serial=yes,, 3.3V TTL,, 3-pin header,, populated,, (1500000 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8211E |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=4-port USB 2.0 Hub Controller;Terminus Technology;FE1.1;;1;,,, Programmable USB Type-C Controller w/PD;ON Semi;FUSB302;;2;,,, 2.8-22V 3A 4-Switch Integrated Buck-Boost Converter;MPS;MP8859;;1;,,, 18V 3A Synchronous Step-Down DC/DC Converter;Richtek;RT6214B;;1;,,, Fixed 3.3V-8A Synchronous Buck Converter w/100mA LDO;MPS;NB680;;1;,,, 5.5V 6A 2.4MHz Synchronous Step Down Regulator;Silergy;SYR837;;1;,,, 5.5V 6A 2.4MHz Synchronous Step Down Regulator;Silergy;SYR838;;1;,,, 1A 1.5MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator;Silergy Corp;SY8088;;2;,,, 6V 2.5A Low Loss Power Distribution Switch;Silergy Corp;SY6282;;1;,,, 5.5V 2A Low Loss Power Distribution Switch;Silergy Corp;SY6280;;3;,,, Power Management IC w/RTC;Rockchip;RK808-D;;1;,,, 4-Line Uni-directional Transient Voltage Suppressor;Will Semiconductor;ESD5304D;;9; |flags=Micro SD Card slot, eMMC module connector, HDMI 2.0, eDP, MIPI DSI, MIPI CSI, MIPI CSI/DSI, RTC w/ battery, IR receiver }} {{TagLine|Six-Core 64-Bit High-Performance Main Board}} :[https://en.t-firefly.com/product/rocrk3399pc#spec-rocrk3399pc Product page]
:Also marketed as ''Libre Computer Renegade Elite''
"Firefly", "ROC-RK3399-PC-V1.1-A", "Libre Computer" :and "2018-09-25" are silkscreened on the board.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Rockchip]] RK3399 @1.8GHz :Dual-Core ARM (Cortex-A72) + :Quad-Core ARM (Cortex-A53) @1.5GHz *GPU: ''Mali-T864'' (OpenGL ES3.1, OpenVG 1.1, OpenCL, DX11, AFBC) :VPU (with 4K VP9 and 4K 10-bit H265/H264 decoding) *Memory: 4GB SDRAM (LPDDR4) *Storage: 4MB SPI Flash, TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *USB: 1x USB 3.0, 1x USB 3.0 (OTG), 3x USB 2.0 ports *Expansion: Available expansion board offering :1x M.2 NGFF (E key), 1x M.2 NGFF (M key) and optional PoE *Power Source: USB Type C (supporting USB PD 2.0)
===Images=== <gallery> File:Firefly ROC-RK3399-PC Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Firefly ROC-RK3399-PC Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
